name: discomfiting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making you feel uncomfortable or uncertain: Being alone in the city at night was a very discomfiting experience. The degree of intimacy in his account is at times a bit discomfiting.
More examplesFewer examplesHe's a very private man and the photo session is discomfiting for him.It's a discomfiting fact for employees, but almost all of these contracts aren't legally binding.The documentary is powerful and discomfiting viewing.I had the discomfiting sense that I was leaving out something crucially important.
